content:
Create a Log a Call Quick Action for Cases

Before you can use case feed in Lightning Experience, you must recreate the Log a Call publisher as a quick action.

Available in: Lightning Experience. Available in Enterprise, Essentials, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions.
User Permissions Needed:
Manage Cases
Customize Application

From Setup, click Object Manager tab. Select Cases, open Buttons, Links, and Actions setup page.
Click New Action.
For Action Type, select Log a Call. For Standard Label Type, select Log a Call. Click Save.
To choose fields users see, customize the action’s layout. Click Save.

After defining the quick action, add it to case page layout so it’s available for agents to use.

Set Up Cases for Lightning Experience
Add Quick Actions to Case Page Layout for Lightning Experience
title: Setting up Log a Call Action in Service Cloud
